fr.upmc.inuits.software.admissioncontroller

Class AdmissionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.inuits.software.admissioncontroller.AdmissionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI, fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.computers.interfaces.ComputerStateDataConsumerI, fr.upmc.inuits.software.application.interfaces.ApplicationSubmissionHandlerI, fr.upmc.inuits.software.autonomiccontroller.interfaces.AutonomicControllerAVMsManagementHandlerI, fr.upmc.inuits.software.autonomiccontroller.interfaces.AutonomicControllerCoordinationHandlerI, fr.upmc.inuits.software.requestdispatcher.interfaces.RequestDispatcherManagementNotificationHandlerI

    public class AdmissionController
extends fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
implements fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.computers.interfaces.ComputerStateDataConsumerI, fr.upmc.inuits.software.application.interfaces.ApplicationSubmissionHandlerI, fr.upmc.inuits.software.requestdispatcher.interfaces.RequestDispatcherManagementNotificationHandlerI, fr.upmc.inuits.software.autonomiccontroller.interfaces.AutonomicControllerAVMsManagementHandlerI, fr.upmc.inuits.software.autonomiccontroller.interfaces.AutonomicControllerCoordinationHandlerI
    La class AdmissionController represente le composant AdmissionController qui gère l'acces aux ressources du centre de calcul par les applications .

    • Nested Class Summary
